languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} is healed for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they are healed for an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: First healing the Reaper receives every round heals the Reaper for Toughness bonus more wounds and increases the Reaper's Toughness by 10 until the end of combat (stacks).

Whenever the Bladedancer is healed for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they are healed for additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

Stacks.

Stacks.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} se cura por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, recupera +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} adicionales y gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} hasta el final del combate. Es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} is healed for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they are healed for an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat. traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} se cura por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, recupera +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} adicionales y gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} hasta el final del combate. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めて回復されるたび、追加で+<u>の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}、戦闘が終了するまで</u>{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}+10を得る。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} is healed for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they are healed for an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めて回復されるたび、追加で+<u>の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}、戦闘が終了するまで</u>{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}+10を得る。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次得到治疗时，刀锋舞者会额外恢复（<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>）点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，同时获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} is healed for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they are healed for an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次得到治疗时，刀锋舞者会额外恢复（<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>）点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，同时获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} est soigné pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il récupère +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g}</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et gagne +10 à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} is healed for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they are healed for an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} est soigné pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il récupère +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g}</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et gagne +10 à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. languages.text: Wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} geheilt, erhält er zusätzlich +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} is healed for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they are healed for an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat. traits.locale_text: Wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} geheilt, erhält er zusätzlich +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} исцеляется в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, он восстанавливает еще <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно и получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez iyileştiğinde +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}DAY{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> kadar daha {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tazelenir ve +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliği kazanır. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
